com.saic.uicds.core.em.service

Interface TaskingService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskingServiceImpl

    @Transactional
public interface TaskingService
    The TaskingService manages Tasking type work products.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ron Ridgely
